sections.title: Are you legally established within the United Kingdom?

fields.label: Are you legally established within the United Kingdom?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you are legally established within the United Kingdom

fields.label: What does legally established mean?
fields.infoText:
Your business is legally established if:
- you are a sole trader who is resident in the UK
- your company or partnership has a registered office in the UK
- your company or partnership has a permanent place of business in the UK where they carry out their business activities

sections.title: You cannot apply for Transitional Simplified Procedures

fields.infoText: You will not be able to continue as you are not legally established within the United Kingdom

fields.label: UK EORI reference
fields.helpText: This is GB followed by 12 numbers, for example GB123456789123.

fields.label: Business or trading name
fields.helpText: This must match the business or trading name you have provided as part of your UK EORI registration.

sections.title: What is your registered office address in the UK?

fields.label: What is your registered office address in the UK?
fields.helpText: You must provide an address based in the UK. For example, a registered office, central headquarters or a permanent business establishment in the UK. If you are a sole trader, this could be your UK residential address.

sections.title: Is your registered office the same as your business address?
sections.shortName: Registered office same as business address

fields.label: Is your registered office the same as your business address?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether the registered office address is the same as your business address

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: Include country code if outside the UK

fields.infoText:
Email is not 100% secure, as it is sent over the internet.

This means it is possible for an email to be intercepted and altered.

Because of this, HMRC reduces the risk to your details wherever possible, for example by only quoting part of unique reference numbers.

We also make sure we only communicate with established business contacts at their correct email addresses.

fields.label: Do you agree to let us contact you by email about your application?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you consent to being contacted using your email address
optionHelpText: We will use telephone or post if we need to contact you about your application

fields.label: Is your business VAT registered?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether your business is VAT registered

fields.label: VAT Registration Number
fields.helpText: Your VAT Registration Number is a 9 digit number supplied when you registered for VAT. For example, 123456789. Please enter the reference with no spaces. You can find it on any correspondence from HM Revenue & Customs relating to your VAT or your VAT certificate.

sections.title: Do you intend to move controlled goods?

fields.label: Do you intend to move controlled goods?
fields.helpText:
Controlled goods are products that require a
license to import, or excise goods, for example
alcohol or tobacco.
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you intend to move controlled goods

fields.infoText:
By completing this declaration, you confirm that:

* you have an EORI number

* you are established in the UK

* you will be importing goods from the EU into the UK

* you will pay in full all duties that you are liable for on these imports, and make all appropriate customs declarations

* the information in this form is true, complete and accurate

fields.label: Provide details below of who is completing this declaration
Job role
fields.helpText: For example, customs manager or other authorised person

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will only use this to send a confirmation that we have received your application

fields.infoText:
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

We have received your registration request for Transitional Simplified Procedures (TSP). 

We will reply with our decision within 15 working  days.

For further information see the [TSP guidance page](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/register-for-simplified-import-procedures-if-the-uk-leaves-the-eu-without-a-deal). 

[What did you think of this service?](https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4830827/Feedback-Transitional-Simplified-Procedures) (takes 30 seconds)
